[Home](./index.md) &gt; [blockly](./blockly.md) &gt; [bubbles](./blockly.bubbles.md) &gt; [Bubble](./blockly.bubbles.bubble.md) &gt; [(constructor)](./blockly.bubbles.bubble._constructor_.md)

## bubbles.Bubble.(constructor)

Constructs a new instance of the `Bubble` class

**Signature:**

```typescript
constructor(workspace: WorkspaceSvg, anchor: Coordinate, ownerRect?: Rect | undefined, overriddenFocusableElement?: SVGElement | HTMLElement);
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  workspace | [WorkspaceSvg](./blockly.workspacesvg.md) | The workspace this bubble belongs to. |
|  anchor | [Coordinate](./blockly.utils.coordinate.md) | The anchor location of the thing this bubble is attached to. The tail of the bubble will point to this location. |
|  ownerRect | [Rect](./blockly.utils.rect.md) \| undefined | _(Optional)_ An optional rect we don't want the bubble to overlap with when automatically positioning. |
|  overriddenFocusableElement | SVGElement \| HTMLElement | _(Optional)_ An optional replacement to the focusable element that's represented by this bubble (as a focusable node). This element will have its ID and tabindex overwritten. If not provided, the focusable element of this node will default to the bubble's SVG root. |
